faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions here.
faq.answer1: Curator AI is an AI-powered information monitoring service. It summarizes news from your favorite websites and topics into a personalized newsletter.
faq.question2: How do I sign up for Curator AI?
faq.answer2: Simply enter your email address on our website. You'll receive a welcome email within 5 minutes.
faq.question3: How can I interact with Curator AI?
faq.answer3: Just reply to any email from the service to add topics, sources, or adjust your preferences.
faq.question4: How can I customize my newsletter?
faq.answer4:
You can customize the frequency, topics, sources, number of articles, and summary length. Just reply to an email with your preferences. For example:

'Hello Curator AI, I‚Äôd like to receive my newsletter every Monday and Thursday at 8 AM. Please include news about AI, healthcare, and finance. Add the websites https://www.lemonde.fr/ and https://www.techcrunch.com/ to my sources. Limit the newsletter to 5 articles per issue, with concise summaries.'
